strings.Value: "We should make sure it's safe. Something dangerous may be stalking us nearby."
"We should look around first. Be sure the camp is secure."
"Yeah, easy for you! You got that dog following you around, barking if anything is off. Too bad it don't talk."
"We'd better stay together. — If someone attacks, we might be too far away to help."
"Oh no. We'll do like all smart adventurers do. — We'll just sit here quietly, and let the adventures come to us!"
"I admit, it worries me a little too, when we camp in the open for all to see. But then I can play the lute — and the light from our campfire can be seen from afar anyway."
"I can go with you! I will ride your beast! Why you looking at me funny? Fine then. Now I'm not going!"
